strapiPost.title: Walton Arts Center Announces 2022-23 Broadway Series
strapiPost.content:
Last night, The Walton Arts Center pulled back the curtain and revealed the line-up for the 2022-2023 Procter & Gamble Broadway Series.

  • On the stage: This next Broadway Series will feature 6 shows all with an undercurrent of celebrating women. The shows are My Fair Lady, Pretty Woman: The Musical, Chicago, Tootsie, Moulin Rouge!, and Hadestown. 
  • Top-notch: The shows have a combined 26 Tony Awards, making 2022-23 the most awarded season to date. The WAC also announced the Arkansas debut of To Kill A Mockingbird for 2023-24. 

Learn more about the announcement and purchasing tickets HERE.
